text: Lillian Russell is a 1940 American biographical musical drama movie directed by Irving Cummings and starring Alice Faye, Henry Fonda, Don Ameche, Edward Arnold, Warren William, Leo Carrillo, Nigel Bruce, Irving Bacon, Lew Fields, Helen Westley, Ernest Truex. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox and was nominated for an Academy Award in 1941. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1940 drama movies Category:1940 musical movies Category:1940s biographical movies Category:American biographical movies Category:American drama movies Category:American musical movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Irving Cummings
title: Lillian Russell (movie)
